mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TEAM ( TEAM_NO, TEAM_NAME, USER_NO, TEAM_GRADE, TEAM_INTRO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_TNO.NEXTVAL, #{teamName}, #{userNo}, #{teamGrade}, #{teamIntro}, #{originName}, #{changeName} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_TEAM WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
FROM TB_TEAM WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY TEAM_NAME ASC
FROM TB_TEAM WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}
FROM TB_TEAM WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
